entity_action.description: The action to execute on the player.
entity_action.markdownDescription: The action to execute on the player.

type.description:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Executes an [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_land) when the player lands on the ground after being airborne.

Type ID: `origins:action_on_land`
